ej,parkc002,P,relic901,Kicking opponent in fight $Tim Belcher fielded the bunt and tagged Chan Ho Park; Park objected to what he thought was a too-hard tag; as the argument escalated, Park drop-kicked Belcher the head; Park was ejected

ej,borbp001,P,davig901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,dempr001,C,davig901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,hundt001,P,davig901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,buhnj001,P,davig901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,martd004,P,davig901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,mesaj001,P,davig901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,panij001,P,davig901,Bench-clearing brawl $Frank Rodriguez threw a pitch inside to Mark Grudzielanek; Rodriguez then swore at Grudzielanek multiple times trying to challenge Grudzielanek to retaliate; both benches cleared and a 15-minute brawl started; Mariners relief pitcher Jose Paniagua hit a Dodger on the head with a punch; Mariners relief pitcher Damaso Marte hit Todd Hundley with a running punch to the head; six players were ejected by crew chief Gerry Davis: Pedro Borbon, Hundley, Jay Buhner, Marte, Jose Mesa and Paniagua; Dodgers coach Rick Dempsey was also ejected and then suspended for 17 games
